explains: adv. 合乎伦理地；伦理上；环保地

sentences.en: Mayors want local companies to behave ethically.
sentences.cn: 市长们希望当地公司按道德行事。

sentences.en: The committee judged that he had not behaved ethically.
sentences.cn: 委员会裁定他的行为违背了道德标准。

sentences.en: Attorneys are ethically and legally bound to absolute confidentiality.
sentences.cn: 律师在道德上和法律上都得绝对保守机密。
